GLOWTAGS_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} You don't have any `Glow Tags` yet. You can create them with the command `{{prefix}}gtc <Name> <Emoji>`
MISSING_GLOWTAG: {{author}} You need to provide a `Glow Tag`
INVALID_GLOW_CODE: {{author}} At least one of the `Glow` codes you provided is either invalid or not in your `Inventory`
